author: Gandhi
message: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever

author: Frank Ocean
message: Whatever you do, never run back to what broke you.
Don't Trust The Right Thing Done For The Wrong Reason
author: interstellar

message: Accident Is The First Building Block Of Evolution
author: interstellar

message: Our Survival Instinct Is Our Single Greatest Source Of Inspiration
author: interstellar

message: Once You’re A Parent, You’re The Ghost Of Your Children’s Future
author: interstellar

message: You have to leave something behind to go forward
author: interstellar

message: No parent should have to watch their own child die
author: interstellar

message: Smile, because it's easier than explaining what is killing you inside.
author: joker

message: Power, prosperity and legacy cannot give you happiness and peace
Smile, because it confuses people.
author: joker

message: Madness is like gravity...all it takes is a little push
author: joker

message: If you’re good at something, never do it for free (where everything is business)
author: joker

message: Nobody panics when things go “according to plan”. Even if the plan is horrifying! Introduce a little anarchy. Upset the established order, and everything becomes chaos
author: joker

message: I believe that whatever doesn't kill you simply makes you stranger
author: joker

message: They Laugh At me Because I'm Different. I laugh At Then Because The're all the same
author: joker

message: Their morals, their code; it's a bad joke. Dropped at the first sign of trouble. They're only as good as the world allows them to be. When the chips are down these, uh, civilized people? They'll eat each other. See I'm not a monster, I'm just ahead of the curve
author: joker

message: The only sensible way to live in this world is without rules
author: joker

message: Maturity is when you realize self respect is greater than love
Someday someone will break you so badly that you'll become unbreakable
We mature with the damage, not with the years
Life is all about growth and change
author: thor

message: The hardest choices require the strongest wills
author: Thanos

message: Reality is often disappointing
author: Thanos

message: Dread it, run from it, destiny arrives all the same
author: Thanos

message: We are all bad in someone's story
Sometimes you can't see what you're learning until you come out the other side
author: wonder woman

message: What one does when faced with the truth is more difficult than you would think
author: wonder woman

message: It is not about what we deserve it is about what we believe
author: wonder woman

message: Peace is a virtue. A state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence and justice. It is not simply the absence of war
author: wonder woman

message: Nothing good is born from lies
author: wonder woman

message: Greatness is not what you think
author: wonder woman

message: It's not your future if you're pretending to be someone else
author: Fear street

message: You can’t outrun who you really are
author: Shang-Chi

message: You are a product of all who came before you. The legacy of your family
author: Shang-Chi

message: Death is what gives life meaning. To know your days are numbered. Your time is short.
author: Dr. strange

message: You cannot beat a river into submission. You have to surrender to its current and use its power as your own.
author: Dr. strange

message: We don’t get to choose our time.
author: Dr. strange

message: Pain is an old friend.
author: Dr. strange

message: We never lose our demons. We only learn to live above them.
author: Dr. strange

message: The training is nothing! Will is everything!
author: batman

message: The first time I stole so that I wouldn’t starve, yes. I lost many assumptions about the simple nature of right and wrong. And when I traveled, I learned the fear before a crime and the thrill of success. But I never became one of them.
author: batman

message: To conquer fear, you must become fear.
author: batman

message: You always fear what you don’t understand.
author: batman

message: Justice is about harmony, revenge is about you making yourself feel better.
author: batman

message: The training is nothing! Will is everything!
author: batman

message: People need dramatic examples to shake them out of apathy and I can’t do that as Bruce Wayne. As a man, I’m flesh and blood, I can be ignored, I can be destroyed, but as a symbol… as a symbol I can be incorruptible, I can be everlasting.
author: batman

message: It’s not who you are underneath, it’s what you do that defines you.
author: batman

message: If you make yourself more than just a man, if you devote yourself to an ideal, and if they can’t stop you, then you become something else entirely.
author: batman

message: Criminals thrive on the indulgence of society’s understanding.
author: batman

message: Create enough hunger and everyone becomes a criminal.
author: batman

message: You either die a hero or live long enough to become the villain.
author: dark knight

message: Sometimes the truth isn’t good enough. Sometimes people deserve more. Sometimes people deserve to have their faith rewarded.
author: dark knight

message: In their last moments, people show you who they really are.
author: dark knight

message: Maybe it’s time we all stop trying to outsmart the truth and let it have its day.
author: dark knight

message: It doesn’t matter who we are, what matters is our plan.
author: dark knight

message: Peace has cost you your strength! Victory has defeated you!
author: dark knight

message: Suffering builds character.
author: dark knight

message: Your life falling apart doesn’t mean you’re special. It means you’re human.
author: superman

message: Every power comes with its own burden.
author: superman

message: Things and people change, life will go on with or without you
A beautiful thing is never perfect
To get lost is to learn the way
If you kill a killer the number of killers in the world remains the same
author: the batman

message: It’s not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
author: the batman

message: A diamond does not lose its value due to lack of admiration
